### Changed
- Upgraded chart dependency to [kube-prometheus-stack-51.0.1](https://github.com/prometheus-community/helm-charts/releases/tag/kube-prometheus-stack-51.0.1)

   - Update `thanos` from 0.32.1 to 0.32.2
